data.actual_result: When you only want to copy their username, you end up copying everything.
data.expected_result: You're only supposed to copy and paste their username, nothing else.
data.short_description: When copying Discord usernames, you end up copying everything.
data.steps_to_repro: - First, go into any Discord server. - Find any player in the player list on the right. - Left click their name in the server so you get their player card. - Scroll over to their username, and highlight the whole username (name and #) by left clicking it twice with your mouse. - Once highlighted, press "Command" and "C" to copy the highlighted text. - Once copied, go into the chat bar and press "Command" and "V" to paste it. - You'll see that instead of only copying the user's username, you copied everything that was present in the user's card, i.e. their roles, what game they were playing.
